**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### Tender Information

* **Title**: Provision of Raw Material for the Manufacture of Mattresses
* **Reference Number**: WS3845039782-DOC4234175620
* **Publication Date**: October 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

### Summary of Tender

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking a Standing Offer (SO) from a qualified contractor to provide raw material for the manufacture of mattresses for the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC). The raw material must meet the technical requirements specified in Annex A.

### Key Details

* **Commodity**: Raw material for mattress manufacture (UNSPSC 56101508)
* **Estimated Annual Quantity**: 11,200 units
* **Contract Period**: One-year contract with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods

### Tender Requirements

This tender is an open process where all qualified contractors are invited to submit a proposal. The selection criterion is "Lowest Price." The tendering process is concurrent and open to all qualified contractors. The contract will be awarded to the contractor with the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Mario Lafleur at 12 Laurier St, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, or by email at [mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mario.lafleur@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
